items.description: Other assets, such as values of claims / interests
items.self_details: The Declaration is a Ltd. Partner in certain Ltd. Partnerships (LPs). The Value of his partnership interest in the LPs, is not capable of determination unless the assets of the LPs of partnership interests are liquidated. Further the liquidation of any LP assets may be subject to market Fluctuations, taxes, exchange rate fluctuations & others restrictions under applicable law.The value of this funds, which may further be subjects to taxes, penalties & exchange rate fluctuations is approximately as mentioned. 1,16,89,730; The declarant has access to retirement & Social Security funds in the United States of America, in the ordinary course the declarant with not have access to these funds until the age of 60.
